    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az elektromosan töltött állapot</string>
            <string language="en-US">Electrically Charged State</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisch Belasteter Zustand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">État Électriquement Chargé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estado Eletricamente Carregado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricato Elettricamente Dichiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικά χρεωμένο κράτος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estado Eléctricamente Cargado</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Töltéshordozók az atomban, az elektromosan töltött és elektromosan semleges állapot, a töltésmegmaradás törvénye, a töltés adagolhatósága</string>
            <string language="en-US">Carrier of Charge in the Atom, The Electrically Charged and Neutral State, Charge Conservation Law, The Capacity of Feeding Charge</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>
            <string language="en-US">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">elektromos alapjelenségek</string>
            <string language="en-US">basic electric phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">töltéshordozók</string>
            <string language="en-US">charged particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">töltésmegmaradás</string>
            <string language="en-US">conservation of charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">töltésátadás</string>
            <string language="en-US">charge loading</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fördermaschine der Ladung im Atom, der 
elektrisch belastete und Nullzustand, Ladung Erhaltung Gesetz, die 
Kapazität des Einziehens der Ladung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Porteur de charge dans l'atome, l'état 
électriquement chargé et neutre, loi d'économie de charge, la 
capacité d'alimenter la charge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Portador da carga no átomo, o estado 
eletricamente carregado e neutro, lei do conservation da carga, a 
capacidade de alimentar a carga</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'elemento portante della carica nell'atomo, 
elettricamente caricato ed il neutrale Dichiarano, legge di 
conservazione della carica, la capienza di alimentazione della carica</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορέας της δαπάνης στο άτομο, το ηλεκτρικά 
χρεωμένο και ουδέτερο κράτος, νόμος συντήρησης δαπανών, η 
ικανότητα της σίτισης της δαπάνης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Portador de la carga en el átomo, el estado 
eléctrica y neutral, ley de la conservación de la carga, la 
capacidad de alimentar la carga</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grundlegende elektrische Phänomene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belastete Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhaltung der Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung Laden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomènes électriques de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">particules chargées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie de charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chargement de charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômenos elétricos básicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">partículas carregadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conservation de carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carregamento da carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeni elettrici di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">particelle caricate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conservazione della carica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caricamento della carica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βασικά ηλεκτρικά φαινόμενα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρεωμένα μόρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντήρηση της δαπάνης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φόρτωση δαπανών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fenómenos eléctricos básicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">partículas cargadas</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conservación de la carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cargamento de la carga</string>
          </keyword>
